::KitKat::

"Bludgeon, Can you cut out the spark out of that....Body?" She had a 
bad taste in her mouth from almost saying that the body was 
Megatrons.  She was extremely upset at all this.  She had risked the 
lives of her team over a stupid clone.  She also had the nagging 
feeling that is Megatron had come up with a clone that was so close 
to looking like him, he could perfect his work and make one that 
would be the perfect identical to the original.  She glared at the 
body. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Bluestreak/Bludgeon:::
> 
> ::He got hit by the missle but dodged the optic blast::
> Bluestreak: Ahhhhhh!
> ::he looked around.  It looked as if the battle was over. He 
transformed to 
> beast mode::
> Bluestreak: Can someone get me back to base?  I need a CR bad.
